summary: I noticed an annoying bug which crept up on me recently, where the music cue used when clearing a dungeon, or something similar, was playing at random. It would most often play just after fast-travelling, but also when just running around. Got on my nerves, so I turned the sounds off completely.
descriptionHtml:
I noticed an annoying bug which crept up on me recently, where the music cue used when clearing a dungeon, or something similar, was playing at random. It would most often play just after fast-travelling, but also when just running around. Got on my nerves, so I turned it off completely.

This might not be a 'bug' exactly; could be the result of my stupidity and some simple mod issue, but, if you're having this problem too, then here you go!

Woop.
author: MrFacepalm
